title: FontLab - can you make letters bolder?
content:
I’m pretty sure I’ve seen this before, but I can’t remember the tool. Is there a way to make a letter bolder? If so, is there a way to do it where it isn’t just a simple stroke around the edge of the entire letter? Thanks.

 [‹ U+0192](http://web.archive.org/web/20071112201150/http:/www.typophile.com/node/35138 "Go to previous forum topic") [How to properly convert RGB image to CMYK for print (help) ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20071112201150/http:/www.typophile.com/node/35989 "Go to next forum topic")
author: russ_mcmullin

comments.content: Thanks oldnick. It’s actually Tools \> Action \> Effects \> Make Bold. I’ve used it before, but forgot to look in Action because there isn’t a triangle to indicate more options underneath.
